== Installing Ubuntu on a MacBook ==

<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MactelSupportTeam/CommunityHelpPages|<nowiki>[[File:IconsPage/index.png|up]]</nowiki></nowiki>]]
<nowiki>[[File:MacBook4-1/Intrepid/MacBooksmall.png]]</nowiki>

=== About ===

This page helps you to find the right documentation, when you want to install  '''Ubuntu''' on a '''Mac``Book'''.

=== Determine your hardware revision ===

To determine which version / generation of Mac``Book you have, you can ...

<nowiki>[[File:OSX.png]]</nowiki> either click in OS X on the Apple on the top left, then "About this Mac" -- "More Info...", see the generation in the "Model Identifier" row; or ... 

<nowiki>[[File:IconsPage/ubuntu.png]]</nowiki> ... under Ubuntu, you can find out what model you have, by typing at the terminal:
<pre>
sudo dmidecode -s system-product-name
</pre>
<nowiki>[[File:IconsPage/terminal.png]]</nowiki> A terminal is opened by going to Applications -> Accessories -> Terminal. 

It will tell you something like ''Mac``Book``4,1'' for example. 

=== MacBook Hardware Revisions and Ubuntu version-specific wikis ===

Now choose the link to the wiki of your hardware revision and the Ubuntu version you are looking for. If you haven't decided yet, what version you like to install: We recommend to '''install the latest official Ubuntu version'''. If there is no such a wiki available, ask for help in the <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/forumdisplay.php?f=328|support forum]]</nowiki>!

* <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/MacBook1-1 |MacBook 1,1]]</nowiki>:
* <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/MacBook2-1 |MacBook 2,1]]</nowiki>:
* <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/MacBook3-1 |MacBook 3,1]]</nowiki>:
* <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/MacBook4-1 |MacBook 4,1]]</nowiki>:
* <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/MacBook5-1 |MacBook 5,1]]</nowiki>:
** <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/MacBook5-1/Trusty|Ubuntu 14.04 (Trusty Tahr)]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/MacBook5-2 |MacBook 5,2]]</nowiki>:
* <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/MacBook5-3 |MacBook 5,3]]</nowiki>:
